mapper.select: SELECT m.username, m.ment, p.photo,m1.nickname,m.email,m.tel,m.userManner FROM memberdetail m JOIN profile p ON p.userId = m.userId JOIN member m1 ON m1.userId = m.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE profile SET photo = #{photo} WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT addr FROM member WHERE userId=#{userId}

SELECT d.subject, m.nickname, d.sdate, d.stime,d.point, md.usermanner,r.dstart,r.num2,r.num FROM delievery d JOIN rider r ON r.num2 = d.num JOIN member m ON m.userId = r.userId JOIN memberdetail md ON md.userId = d.userId WHERE d.userId = #{userId} AND d.subject IN ( SELECT subject FROM delievery WHERE userId = #{userId} GROUP BY subject ) ORDER BY d.subject
mapper.update: UPDATE rider SET dstart = 2 WHERE num2 = #{num2}
UPDATE rider SET dstart = 1 WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE rider SET dstart = 4 WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE delievery SET state = 2 WHERE num = #{num2}
mapper.select: select tablename,borrownum num,location,categorynum,subject,regDate from borrow where userId=#{userId}

select s.tnum,s.userId,subject,tablename from scrap s join togetherlist t on t.tnum = s.tnum where s.userId = #{userId} union select tm.tboardnum,tm.userId,subject,tablename from tmBookmarks tm join talentMarket ta on ta.tboardnum=tm.tboardnum where tm.userId = #{userId} union select u.num,u.userId,subject,tablename from usedLike u join used ud on ud.num=u.num where u.userId = #{userId} union select a.anum,a.userId,subject,tablename from auctionLike a join auction at on at.anum=a.anum where a.userId = #{userId}
select b.tablename,bw.borrownum num,b.location,b.categorynum,b.subject from borrow b join borrowLike bw on bw.borrownum = b.borrownum where bw.userId=#{userId}
